meanings.definition: A master of ceremonies at a formal event.
meanings.sent1: The emcee welcomed guests to the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The emcee announced the winner of the talent show.
meanings.sent3: The emcee told a joke to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent4: The emcee's voice filled the room with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The emcee's presence made the event unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To act as a master of ceremonies at an event.
meanings.sent1: She will emcee the charity auction next week.
meanings.sent2: He emceed the award ceremony with confidence.
meanings.sent3: They asked him to emcee because of his sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: The way she emceed the event was truly captivating.
meanings.sent5: Emceeing requires good communication skills and stage presence.
